"Nonsense, nonsense!" cried the old man, shaking his pigtail to see whether it was firmly plaited, and grasping hisson by the hand. "The house for your wife is ready. Princess Mary will take her there and show her over, and they'll talk nineteen to the dozen. That's their wom- an's way! I am glad to have her. Sit down and talk.
